content: We are given with a file. I ran file command on it to figure it’s file type:
Ok, we have raw image file which will probably contain file/s with the flag. I’ll show 2 methods, choose your preferred one.Run foremost on the file:

You’ll get a folder named output with zip file, movie file and pptx file. Extract the pptx file using 7-zip (PPTX is an archive file), go to the /ppt/media folder and you’ll find the MaxiCode image.Scan it either online or offline to reveal the flag.
